data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 12,928 believers in North Kurdufan to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North Kurdufan, Sudan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to North Kurdufan, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of North Kurdufan, Sudan that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in North Kurdufan, Sudan to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 3,327,072 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Berti people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of North Kurdufan.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 3,340,000 people living in the state of North Kurdufan.

data.section_summary:
the state of North Kurdufan, Sudan has a population of 3,340,000.

We estimate North Kurdufan has 12,928 people who might know Jesus, 153,578 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,173,494 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in North Kurdufan that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.
